name: FairyTal
description:
Battles of the fairy tales!

-----------------------------------------

Xbox controller:

Joystick: Move
A: Jump/Confirm
B: Dash/Cancel
X: Attack
Y: Skill

RB: Ultimate skill(At flashing hp)

-----------------------------------------

Keyboard:

WSAD: Move
J: Jump/Confirm
K: Dash/Cancel
H: Attack
U: Skill

I: Ultimate skill(At flashing hp)

-----------------------------------------
